def concat_strings(str1, str2):
    """
    Concatenates two strings, ensuring uppercase, alphabetical characters, 
    maximum length, minimum length, sorted in reverse order, and no duplicates.

    Args:

    str2 (str): The second string.

    """

    str1 = str1[:10]

    """
    Concatenates two strings, ensuring uppercase, alphabetical characters, 
    maximum length, minimum length, sorted in reverse order, and no duplicates.

    str1 = str1[:10]
